data.name: MiTOSSis
data.detailed_description: Pick up and throw 3D cells generated from real microscopy data. Sort them by the stages of cell division, mitosis, to test your biology knowledge!
data.about_the_game: Pick up and throw 3D cells generated from real microscopy data. Sort them by the stages of cell division, mitosis, to test your biology knowledge!
data.short_description: A biology puzzle with real microscopy data

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent
